responses: {"avg_strategy":"I first tried to remember the darkest and  brightest color within the collection.  Then, I briefly skimmed over all the items in the color and memorized the general brightness of the collection, i.e. how many are faded or dark colored.  From there I looked for the max and min values within the question, and adjusted my answer within those values until I felt that it was close to what I thought the average was."}
